name: The Funniest Twitter Ever
description:
Do you think that the style of Twitter is annoying and miss some colors ? Me too ! 
That's why I created a new style with animations, funny colors and a new font ! Once you try it you wont never go back to the old I promise ! Trust me dude !
additional_info:
If you have any suggestions to improve my style hit me up on my email : 

rvuilleumier@eracom.educanet2.ch

!!! Don't forget to delete the comment marks in the CSS - Stylus !!!
